root.name: frustum()
root.description: Sets a perspective matrix defined through the parameters. Works like glFrustum, except it wipes out the current perspective matrix rather than muliplying itself with it.
root.syntax: frustum(left, right, bottom, top, near, far)

parameter.label: left
parameter.description: float: left coordinate of the clipping plane

parameter.label: right
parameter.description: float: right coordinate of the clipping plane

parameter.label: bottom
parameter.description: float: bottom coordinate of the clipping plane

parameter.label: top
parameter.description: float: top component of the clipping plane

parameter.label: near
parameter.description: float: near component of the clipping plane

parameter.label: far
parameter.description: float: far component of the clipping plane
